SEARCH
Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.mutations

Class MutationEffects<V>

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.mutations.MutationEffects<V>
Type Parameters:
V - The type of value used for the modifier effects, such as Integer or Double.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Modifier
public class MutationEffects<V> extends Object implements Modifier
Represents a mutation modifier that adds various effects to a user's loadout. Each mutation has a condition that must be met before any effects are applied.

  • Field Details

    • modifierSource

      private final ModifierSource modifierSource
      The source type of the modifier (ModifierSource). This is used by the ModifierBoostService to apply a modification to the mutations effects if a corresponding effect is available.

    • condition

      private final org.springframework.expression.Expression condition
      The condition required to use the mutation. If the condition is not met, the effects will not be applied. ExpressionDeserializer will take the string value of the property "conditionString" and convert it into an expression. ModifierConditionLogic is used to check the condition. If a condition string is not included, the mutation effect will always be used.

    • effects

      private final HashMap<ModifierTypes,V> effects
      The effects of the mutation. An effect consists of a ModifierTypes and a value (Integer or Double). If an effect requires additional logic to determine the applied value, use "ADDITIONAL_CONTEXT_REQUIRED" alongside the name of mutation. This will be used by the ModifierExpressionService to determine the appropriate value.
